title: Understand and Enjoy Modern Art (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Understand and Enjoy Modern Art

Thomas Y. Crowell Company | 1967 | English | 368 pages | PDF | 40.3 MB

With 126 reproductions in black and white and 8 in color To see is no easy matter. Two persons inspect the same painting. For one it is nonsense; for the other, it is a work of beauty. Why? This book shows you how to see modern art. In straightforward, plain language, George A. Flanagan takes you through the fascinating history of modern art, beginning with Cezanne and Van Gogh. Mr. Flanagan clearly explains how the painters develop their intuitions on canvas, and why
